### Read Some Papers
For each reading below, write a **single post** on Slack with the following:


```{r echo=FALSE}

slackico <- as.character("/readings/01-readings_files/slack-ico.png{width=20px}")


readings <- tibble(
  
  paper <- c("Visser, B.A, Batinic, M., Worth, N., Book, A. & Toll, E. (2020). Psychopathic Sims: Testing the Cheater-Hawk Hypothesis in a Video Game. *Evolutionary Psychological Science 6*, 229â€“240.", 
             "Mathison, S. (2006). What is the difference between evaluation and research - and why do we care? In N.L. Smith and P.R. Brandon (Eds.) *Fundamental issues in evaluation*. Guilford Press.",
             "Davidson, J. (2004). What is Evaluation? *Evaluation Methodology Basics: The Nuts and Bolts of Sound Evaluation*. Sage."
  ),
  
  post <- c("Focusing on just the measures, what are your thoughts regarding the validity and reliability of the study?",
            "How is evaluation viewed in your field? Is it generally feared, welcomed, both, neither?",
            "*none*"),
  
  channel <- c(
    "`#psychopathic-sims`",
    "`#mathison`",
    "*not applicable*"
  ),

  link <- c(
     paste0("[![",slackico,"](/readings/01-readings_files/slack-ico.png 'Slack Icon'){width=20px}]",
    "(https://2021edp611.slack.com/archives/C021WQ54BML){target='_blank'}"
    ),
     paste0("[![",slackico,"](/readings/01-readings_files/slack-ico.png 'Slack Icon'){width=20px}]",
    "(https://2021edp611.slack.com/archives/C021WQ54BML){target='_blank'}"
    ),
    "*none*"
  ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"
  
)

```

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE}
readings %>%

```

### Review Some Texts

```{r echo=FALSE}

document <- as.character(fa("file", fill = "#e86af0", height = "20px"))

book <- as.character(fa("book", fill = "#f06ab5", height = "20px"))

site <- as.character(fa("link", fill = "	#a56af0", height = "20px"))

review <- tibble(
  
  source <- c("The syllabus (did you listen to Snoop?)", 
              "CDC's introduction to evaluation with a focus on public health",
                "Part I: The Essence of Research in the Counseling Profession covering Chapters 1-4 in Balkin & Kleist",
                "Chapter I: Introduction to Educational and Psychological Measurement Using R in Albano"
  ),
  
  link <- c(
    paste0("[",document,"]", "(https://www.cdc.gov/eval/guide/introduction/index.htm){target='_blank'}"),
    paste0("[",book,"]",
    "(https://www.cdc.gov/eval/guide/introduction/index.htm){target='_blank'}"
    ),
    paste0("[",site,"]",
    "(https://library.wvu.edu/){target='_blank'}"
    ),
    paste0("[",book,"]",
    "(https://www.thetaminusb.com/intro-measurement-r/introduction.html)^[It is absolutely fine if you cannot understand some of what is presented, especially the syntax. Copy and paste the code into your R console to follow along.]"
    )
    
  ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"
  
)

```

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE}
review %>%
  kbl(col.names = c("Review", "Link"), 
      "html", 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'lc') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "30em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "10em") %>%
  row_spec(0, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') %>%
  row_spec(1, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') %>%
  row_spec(2, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') %>%
  row_spec(3, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;')
```
</center>
